name: iLLANG
description:
Gather a group of friends and hunt down the Illang (wolf) hiding in Koji Village!
In the peaceful Koji Village, a wolf in sheep's clothing is hiding among the villagers, plotting to hunt you and your friends down. Complete various mini-game missions before you are eaten, and team up with your friends to banish the beast from the village!

Work together or turn against each other to emerge victorious in this exciting tug-of-war of deception!




  • Outsmart the Illang using the special skills from the unique jobs available to the Villagers team.
  • Look for clues that will lead you to the identity of the Illang.
  • Vote against the suspected player and banish them from Koji Village!


  • Do not let the Villagers complete their missions.
  • If the number of Illang is equal to or higher than of the Villagers, the Illang team wins.
  • Use secret passages to get around Koji Village undetected and eat the villagers.



Game Features

  • Cute and adorable chibi characters!
  • Various mini-games such as Flower Bloom, Cat Finder, Treasure Hunt and more!
  • Missions and skills that vary depending on your character's role!
  • Wide range of customization options for outfits, accessories, pets, etc.
  • Communicate with your friends via text chat, voice chat, and more!
  • Cross-platform play between PC, Android, iOS, .
